DOC.brief_summary: In order attain elite level national scene , volleyball player need several attribute . In addition master technical tactical skill , great jumping ability another important asset . Maximal power output need achieve height jump necessitates coordinate neuromuscular recruitment muscle mass among others . Interestingly , claim alpha-glycerylphosphorylcholine ( A-GPC ) increase acetylcholine synthesis enhance exercise-induced increase plasma growth hormone concentration , two factor could theoretically associate neuromuscular transmission muscle mass . However , study investigate role A-GPC human exercise performance . Published result mixed . One recent study show isometric peak force slightly significantly increased subject ingest daily dose 600 mg A-GPC period 6 day ( Bellar et al. , JISSN , 2015 ) . The objective study evaluate longer-term effect ( 4 week ) use high dose ( 1000 mg/day ) A-GPC jump capability elite male female volleyball player .
DOC.brief_title: Alpha-GPC Physical Cognitive Performances Volleyball Players .
DOC.detailed_description: Our study design placebo control , randomize , double-blind , crossover study . Varsity male female volleyball player ( n=28 ) ask participate arm study , i.e . placebo A-GPC ( 1000 mg/kg/day ) . The duration arm study 4 week separate 7-day washout period . The order treatment ( placebo A-GPC ) determine randomly . Athletes ask maintain training load duration experiment .
DOC.criteria: Be competitive varsity volleyball player Regular consumption alphaGPC within last 4 month Receiving drug treatment except 1 ) contraception ( pill ) , 2 ) treatment asthma
